description: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Availability Console - Tenant Overview

targets.query: SELECT (mean("storageQuota") - mean("usedStorageQuota")) * (100 / mean("storageQuota"))  FROM "veeam_vac_backupresources" WHERE ("companyName" =~ /^$tenant$/)AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "cloudRepositoryName"
SELECT mean("allowedBandwidth") FROM "veeam_vac_tenant" WHERE ("companyName" =~ /^$tenant$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("capacity") - mean("freeSpace")) * (100 / mean("capacity"))  FROM  "veeam_vac_repositories" WHERE ("companyName" =~ /^$tenant$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "repoName"

panels.title: Veeam Backup on-prem Repository - Usage Capacity

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_vac_tenant WITH KEY=companyName
list.label: Tenant
list.name: tenant
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_vac_tenant WITH KEY=companyName

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_vac_vbrlicense WITH KEY=backupServerName
list.label: On-prem VBR
list.name: vbrserver
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_vac_vbrlicense WITH KEY=backupServerName

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_vac_jobs WITH KEY=veeamjobname
list.label: Backup Job
list.name: job
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_vac_jobs WITH KEY=veeamjobname

title: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Availability Console - Tenant Overview
